name: nymph-query-editor
description: A Nymph query editor built with Svelte.

scripts.build: npm run build-QueryEditor && npm run build-SelectorEditor && npm run build-ValueEditor
scripts.build-QueryEditor: svelte compile --format es src/QueryEditor.html > lib/QueryEditor.js && babel lib/QueryEditor.js -o lib/QueryEditor.js
scripts.build-SelectorEditor: svelte compile --format es src/SelectorEditor.html > lib/SelectorEditor.js && babel lib/SelectorEditor.js -o lib/SelectorEditor.js
scripts.build-ValueEditor: svelte compile --format es src/ValueEditor.html > lib/ValueEditor.js && babel lib/ValueEditor.js -o lib/ValueEditor.js

author: Hunter Perrin <hperrin@gmail.com>
